conversationFeature.title: Go Deeper with Conversation Mode
conversationFeature.subtitle: Don't just search, explore. Continue the conversation with AI to refine results and uncover more insights.

step1.title: Start a Search
step1.description: Begin with any query. Get initial results and the AI summary.

step2.title: Activate Conversation
step2.description: Click the message icon in the search bar (available after the first search). The bar will highlight.

step3.title: Ask Your Follow-Up
step3.description: Type your related question. The AI uses the previous context for a smarter, relevant answer.

benefit1.title: Context-Aware
benefit1.description: AI understands the thread, providing relevant follow-ups.

benefit2.title: Efficient Exploration
benefit2.description: Quickly refine your search without starting over.

benefit3.title: Natural Interaction
benefit3.description: Feels like a real conversation with your search engine.
